params.drawIndex: Draw index in the draws array
params.timestamp: Epoch timestamp when the draw is created.
params.winningRandomNumber: Randomly generated number used to calculate draw winning numbers

drawIdToDrawIndex(uint32).details: Use the draw id to calculate the draw index position in the draws ring buffer.

draws().details: Return all draws from the draws ring buffer.

getDraw(uint32).details: Read draw from the draws ring buffer using the draw id.

getDraws(uint32[]).details: Read multiple draws from the draws ring buffer from an array of draw ids.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pushDraw((uint256,uint32,uint32)).details: External function to create a new draw from an authorized manager or owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDraw(uint256,(uint256,uint32,uint32)).details: External function to set an existing draw from an authorized manager or owner.

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

DrawSet(uint256,uint32,uint32,uint256).notice: Emit when a new draw has been created.

drawIdToDrawIndex(uint32).notice: External function to calculate draw index using the draw id.

getDraw(uint32).notice: Read draw from the draws ring buffer.

getDraws(uint32[]).notice: Read multiple draws from the draws ring buffer.

nextDrawIndex().notice: Next ring buffer index position when pushing a new draw.

pushDraw((uint256,uint32,uint32)).notice: External function to create a new draw.

setDraw(uint256,(uint256,uint32,uint32)).notice: External function to set an existing draw.
